functions.name: .getNodeEnergyUsage()
functions.description: Get the energy usage of this AE node

functions.name: .findItem(item: string|table)
functions.description: Search for an item in the network. You can specify the item as a string, with or without the damage value ('minecraft:stone' or 'minecraft:stone@0') or as a table with 'name', 'damage' and 'nbthash' fields. You must specify the 'name', but you can leave the other fields empty.

functions.name: .getCraftingCPUs()
functions.description: List all crafting cpus in the network

functions.name: .getItemMeta(slot: int)
functions.description: The metadata of the item in the specified slot. The slot number starts from 1.

functions.name: .list()
functions.description: List all items in this inventory

functions.name: .suck(slot?: int, limit?: int)
functions.description: Suck an item from the ground

functions.name: .pushItems(toName: string, fromSlot: int, limit?: int, toSlot?: int)
functions.description: Push items from this inventory to another inventory. Returns the amount transferred.

functions.name: .listAvailableItems()
functions.description: List all items which are stored in the network

functions.name: .pullItems(fromName: string, fromSlot: int, limit?: int, toSlot?: int)
functions.description: Pull items to this inventory from another inventory. Returns the amount transferred.

functions.name: .getTransferLocations(location?: string)
functions.description: Get a list of all available objects which can be transferred to or from

functions.name: .getNetworkEnergyStored()
functions.description: Get the energy stored usage in this AE network

functions.name: .getNetworkEnergyUsage()
functions.description: Get the energy usage of this AE network

functions.name: .findItems(item: string|table)
functions.description: Search all items in the network. You can specify the item as a string, with or without the damage value ('minecraft:stone' or 'minecraft:stone@0') or as a table with 'name', 'damage' and 'nbthash' fields. You must specify the 'name', but you can leave the other fields empty.

functions.name: .getItem(slot: int)
functions.description: The item in the specified slot. The slot number starts from 1.

functions.name: .drop(slot: int, limit?: int, direction?: string)
functions.description: Drop an item on the ground. Returns the number of items dropped
